Alias.name: Reset UI
Alias.script: -- Warning - This resets the whole profile resetProfile() send("look")

Alias.name: Reset Harmony
Alias.script:
Harmony = nil
-- Loads the script local _sep if string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/" then _sep = "/" else _sep = "\\" end
local scriptFile = getMudletHomeDir() .. _sep .. "harmony" .. _sep .."harmony.lua" dofile(scriptFile)

Alias.name: Start Chat
Alias.script: -- Tries to make Mudlet start getting Channel.Com events Harmony.turnOnChat()

Key.script: if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("0") else send("map") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("1") else send("sw") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("2") else send("s") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("3") else send("se") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("4") else send("w") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("5") else send("look") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("6") else send("e") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("7") else send("ne") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("8") else send("n") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("9") else send("ne") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("/") else send("in") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("*") else send("out") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("-") else send("up") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey("+") else send("down") end
if Harmony then Harmony.keypad.processKey(".") else keneanung.bashing.checkingIH = true send("ih") end

Script.name: load
Script.script:
-- Loads the script local _sep if string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/" then _sep = "/" else _sep = "\\" end
local scriptFile = getMudletHomeDir() .. _sep .. "harmony" .. _sep .."harmony.lua" dofile(scriptFile)

regexCodeList.string: You stride up the lowered boarding plank.
^You quickly utter \".*\" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to above the clouds over central sapience\.$
You disembark the ship via the lowered gangplank.
return not Harmony.ui.maps.capturingWilderness and not Harmony.ui.maps.capturedWilderness

Trigger.name: On Room Name
Trigger.script:
local cleanName = matches[1]
cleanName = cleanName:gsub(" (room)", "")
if cleanName:match(gmcp.Room.Info.name) then Harmony.ui.maps.capturingWilderness = true clearUserWindow("wildernessMap") end

regexCodeList.string: The ship comes out of the harbour and glides to a halt.
The ship completes docking at the harbour, and the crew lowers the anchor.

Trigger.name: Flying
Trigger.script: if matches[1]:match(gmcp.Room.Info.name) then Harmony.ui.maps.capturingWilderness = true clearUserWindow("wildernessMap") end

Trigger.name: Road
Trigger.script: if matches[1]:match(gmcp.Room.Info.name) then Harmony.ui.maps.capturingWilderness = true clearUserWindow("wildernessMap") end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Party\): (\w+) says, "I am calling targets, focus your fine on my command\."$

Trigger.name: Stop Calling
Trigger.script: if Harmony.raid.areFollowing(matches[2]) then Harmony.raid.setLeader() Harmony.target.clear() end

regexCodeList.string: ^A nearly invisible magical shield forms around (\w+)\.$
^You suddenly perceive the vague outline of an aura of rebounding around (\w+)\.$
^There is a door in the way, to the .*\.$
